nodes.description: 保加利亚发生恐怖袭击，导致五名以色列人丧生
nodes.support_text: Interpol will send a team of experts to Bulgaria to investigate the Burgas terror attack where five Israelis were killed

nodes.description: 保加利亚Focus新闻 agency报道Interpol派遣专家团队前往调查
Interpol秘书长Ronald Noble谴责此次恐怖袭击
nodes.support_text: Interpol Secretary General Ronald Noble condemned the attack

nodes.description: Noble指出袭击者使用的伪造美国身份证件可能对调查至关重要
nodes.support_text: He says the information about the fake US ID papers of the perpetrator could be indispensable and crucial if it is found in the organization’s database

nodes.description: Interpol数据库包含250万份丢失或被盗的真实美国护照信息
nodes.support_text: The database includes information on 2.5 million lost or stolen authentic US passports

edges.support_text: Interpol Secretary General Ronald Noble condemned the attack
He says the information about the fake US ID papers of the perpetrator could be indispensable and crucial if it is found in the organization’s database
The database includes information on 2.5 million lost or stolen authentic US passports
